XData.name: XMLData
XData.Data: <Definition Identifier="PatientAlerts"> <Rule Title="Not young anymore!" Condition="context.Patient.DOB > $horolog-30"> <Action Type="call" Class="IAT.RuleEngine.Test.Utils" Method="SendEmail" Args=""test@server.com","Patient is so old!""/> <Action Type="call" Class="IAT.RuleEngine.Test.Utils" Method="ShowObject" Args="context.Patient"/> <Action Type="return"/> </Rule> </Definition>
